project.title: PROJECTS
project.text-hover-img: It may take a few seconds to load due to server deployment
project.project1-text: I was asked to create a system for student registration, where they could enroll in specific courses. In this system, you can check information like the student's seniority in a specific course, whether they are graduated or not, etc. All of this should be done in a REST API.
